Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.games.GameBoard
      • src.chess.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends GameBoard
    ChessBoard extends the class GameBoard from src.games and is used for constructing an initial chess board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayingPiece[] getPlayingPieces()
      Returns the PlayingPiece list which is used to initialize the board.
      void setNewBoard(java.lang.String input)
      The method gets the new state of the game board as a simple String, converts it into a two dimensional PlayingPiece array and updates the game board state.
      protected PlayingPiece[][] setUpBoard()
      The method setUpBoard() returns a chess board with an initial setup.
